entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Simpson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:56 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -37.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Simpson Airport 03:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -37.1°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 67 %

Dewpoint: -41.0°C
Wind: SSE 3 km/h

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 37 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 37 by morning. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
